website_summaries.verdict: Hang on a patio umbrella or anyplace you want ambient light: these cute, sun-powered lanterns come in a money-saving set of four.
pros: Users love how they flicker like real candles without the fire hazard
After charging all day, the lights will glow all night
Make great accents not only for umbrellas, but for garden paths, patio tables, and even hanging from windows indoors
cons: Not nearly as bright as lights that attach directly to poles
Designed more for decoration than functionality

customer_reviews.title: Great decorative lighting.
customer_reviews.text: As others have stated, smaller than I thought they would be but if I had just looked at the measurements, I would have realized that. I have them hanging in my cypress tree (along with the hanging Spanish moss) and have received great comments. I can see that they would also look nice along a porch or table umbrella. They are still lit (dim but showing up) in the morning before it gets light out. I will be buying more for uses in other areas. Doesn't provide enough light to light up an area but great ambient lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Denise L.

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice lights. Not a lot of light but the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice lights . Not a lot of light but the twinkle effect is very nice . They last all night with enough sun
customer_reviews.author: dean fluss

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These truly are my favorite solar lights that I ever tried!! They are a perfect size and the lantern design is elegant! I love the flickering the candle makes and gives that real candle look!! I bought 2 sets for my backyard and received so many compliments! I am very happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: VaLori

customer_reviews.title: These lights are really cool. They work really well for lighting on our ...
customer_reviews.text: These lights are really cool. They work really well for lighting on our pergola. If you want bright lights, these aren't the ones you want. They're more for decoration but they flicker like they're a real candle
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Fricke

customer_reviews.title: So cute, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Just wonderful. These are in my tree in the back yard. They work every day and make the backyard feel warm. Buying more bc its a big tree could use two more
customer_reviews.author: whyyyyy

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: The measurements are from bottom to top of the clip, so at first I was disappointed. But I must say, I have hung them on my porch and they are fantastic!! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to my patio
customer_reviews.text: They are smaller than they appear on the site, but works out very well for me. I,bought the hooks also and put them between the planters on my patio. They are very attractive
customer_reviews.author: Judy Lynn Brewster

customer_reviews.title: really cute
customer_reviews.text: smaller than expected but really cute.. and the flicker makes it looks like the wind is doing it.. in fact that is what we told the kids and they just stare at them when the breeze comes up
customer_reviews.author: george A hall

customer_reviews.title: Glows like real candles
customer_reviews.text: Glows like real candles. Not much illumination if you are expecting it to be a reading lamp.Charges well in solar. I had used it in my gazebo and the clips broke with some storm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little solar lantern
customer_reviews.text: So far these little lanterns have been great. I have them in flower pots and along a path. They seem to power up nicely from the sun and hold a charge well into the night.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Merryfield

customer_reviews.title: These little lights charge up nicely and stay lit all night but their light is ...
customer_reviews.text: These little lights charge up nicely and stay lit all night but their light is so dim it is more decorative. Dont buy it to mark a pathway.
customer_reviews.author: Lois L

customer_reviews.title: Nice accent lights for your garden.
customer_reviews.text: Lanterns illuminate for a long time. I wish they were brighter, but they are accent lights, so I guess dimmer is to be expected. I had trouble removing the protective tape from half of the solar collectors, because they did not have corner grab tabs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look great!
customer_reviews.text: Used these to hang on my fence and they look amazing! They've been through a few thunderstorms already and no issues yet. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable. I just wish they would've been bigger
customer_reviews.author: MEL GN

customer_reviews.title: Just keep them in the sun all day and they'll illuminate all night!
customer_reviews.text: They are smaller than I thought but they hold the light really well are quite bright. I like them a lot!
customer_reviews.author: So Fla Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than they look and not bight. Not worth the money. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndeanne

customer_reviews.title: A Good Buy...
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected but a very good buy nevertheless. Adds a nice touch around the fish pond in our patio.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiian Punch

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very small; too small for the job we wanted them to perform in the back yard.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect look for our porch.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, the lights flicker and actually look like a lit candle.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Not bright at all
customer_reviews.text: Not bright at all. They literally flicker like a candle, not good enough to use as driveway indicators
customer_reviews.author: K. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These lanterns are amazing. I've waited all summer to write a review just to be sure. I've had to change the battery in only one, AA. We have had strong winds and they've stayed securely attached. The candles look realistic and I love the solar powered aspect. So effortlessly relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: dpshepard

customer_reviews.title: These are BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to hang and look BEAUTIFUL! I will definitely be getting more for our outdoor area.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Hurd

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice to replace on my stakes I already had, from a much less reliable source of lights.
customer_reviews.author: Bonita C. Bilyeu

customer_reviews.title: Great lights for your yard.
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights. Have bought several dents over the last few years. Makes yard cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky L. Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Liked them so much ordered another 4
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute & work really well. Liked them so much ordered another 4.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work good, we are enjoying them at our front & back entrances.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to hang on hooks around our pool! They set off the perfect soft white light for the evening and night time. I leave them out all the time and they still work perfectly after heavy rains, high winds, and even a hail storm!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Bagley

customer_reviews.title: These went through a horrible wind and rain storm a couple of weeks ago ...
customer_reviews.text: These went through a horrible wind and rain storm a couple of weeks ago and they are still working fine. They are hanging in my dogwood tree and they look beautiful at night. Will soon order more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks great in my garden
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I think, but so cute, looks great in my garden, bright all the night.
customer_reviews.author: cubanaza

customer_reviews.title: Okay but would have expected better quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought they would be ~ my fault for not fully reading description. I gave 3 stars because of the way the "candles" light up. Looks cheap. For the money I would have expected better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They flicker like a candle. Looks great in the garden.
customer_reviews.author: Gorham Black

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and worked great for the 1st month
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and worked great for the 1st month. After that they worked intermittently and now not at all :(
customer_reviews.author: kre

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these are so beautiful in my backyard at night. batteries still going. lovely
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We really liked these but one of the lanterns didn't work
customer_reviews.text: We really liked these but one of the lanterns didn't work. We tried putting in a new battery but that didn't work. Not worth our time or money sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Teri L. Skotnicky

product_meta.title: FALOVE Vintage Waterproof Outdoor Solar Power Twinkle Yellow LED Candle Light Yard Garden Decoration Umbrella Tree Lantern Hang Hanging Lamp (1)
product_meta.description:
Item Package Quantity:1Specification: Item Name:Solar umbrella lantern. 
Solar Panel:2V/60MA. 
Storage Battery: 1pc AA Size 600mAh 1.2V NI-MH. 
Light Source:1pc white LED （Φ5*8.7mm/round) 
Lumen:7LM. 
Color Temperature:3000K. 
Working Time:6-9 H. 
Charging Time:4.5 H. Function:Solar panels charge 4.5 hours under standard sunlight, can lights 6-9h. 
IP Grade:IP44. 
Main Material: ABS,PS,iron. 
Crust Color:Black Color. 
Item Size:8.9*8.9*12.7 cm 

Features: Brand new and high quality. suitable for beach umbrella, tree, pavilion.
With the steel hand, it can be easily fixed or moved simulates the twinkle candle effect.
Solar energy lamp, charge at day and light at night automatically.
Low carbon and environmental protection.
Note: 1. As the charging effect of the solar panel is depend on the sunlight, the LED light time is affected by weather, seasons, places, etc. 
2. It is charging only when the button is turned ON. 
3. Please put the solar panel under direct sunshine. 
4. Although it is waterproof, please avoid soaking it in the water 
Package includes: 1x Solar Power Hang Candle Led
feature_bullets: Brand new and high quality. Suitable for beach umbrella, tree, pavilion.
With the steel hand, it can be easily fixed or moved.
Solar energy lamp, charge at day and light at night automatically.
